mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT VALUES (PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, NULL, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, SYSDATE, 0, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT P.*, M.M_ID FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.P_STATE = 1 ORDER BY P.P_NO DESC ) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.P_STATE = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT PRODUCT.*, MEMBER.M_ID FROM product INNER JOIN MEMBER ON PRODUCT.S_NO = MEMBER.M_NO WHERE S_NO = (SELECT M_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{query}) ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE S_NO = (SELECT M_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{query} )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT PRODUCT.*, MEMBER.M_ID FROM product INNER JOIN MEMBER ON PRODUCT.S_NO = MEMBER.M_NO WHERE P_NAME LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_NAME LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT P.*, M.M_ID FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.B_NO = #{m_No} ORDER BY P.P_STATE DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE S_NO = #{m_No} ) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT P.*, M.M_ID FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO ) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT P.*, M.M_ID FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P_STATE = #{p_State} ) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P_STATE = #{p_State}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT PRODUCT.*, MEMBER.M_ID FROM product INNER JOIN MEMBER ON PRODUCT.S_NO = MEMBER.M_NO WHERE S_NO = (SELECT M_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{query}) AND P_STATE = #{p_State}) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE S_NO = (SELECT M_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{query} ) AND P_STATE = #{p_State}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT PRODUCT.*, MEMBER.M_ID FROM product INNER JOIN MEMBER ON PRODUCT.S_NO = MEMBER.M_NO WHERE P_NAME LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' AND P_STATE = #{p_State} ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE P_NAME LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%' AND P_STATE = #{p_State}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT P.*, M.M_ID FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.P_STATE=1 AND P.P_CARTEGORY=#{p_Cartegory} ) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.P_STATE=1 AND P.P_CARTEGORY=#{p_Cartegory}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT P.*, M.M_ID FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.P_STATE = 1 AND P.P_CARTEGORY = #{p_Cartegory} AND M.M_ID = #{query}) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.P_STATE=1 AND P.P_CARTEGORY=#{p_Cartegory} AND P.S_NO = (SELECT M_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{query})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT P.*, M.M_ID FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.P_STATE = 1 AND P.P_CARTEGORY = #{p_Cartegory} AND P_NAME LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%') A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON P.S_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.P_STATE=1 AND P.P_CARTEGORY=#{p_Cartegory} AND P_NAME LIKE '%' || TRIM(#{query}) || '%'
